item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

Announcing the September Boston Karaoke Meetup for 2012.  We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM.

I am going to try something a little different this month.  Given the number of people who "sign up" and are "no shows", I have decided to ask people pay up front when they sign up using Paypal.

I am sorry for the inconvenience, but this will make it better for those who really want to attend.

I am disabling guests to make sure that I can create a Name Tag for everyone.  If you have a guest, have them register and RSVP for themselves.  Make sure your name is correct on the site, that's what I use to create your Name Tag.

To make sure you have  a spot, please sign up early.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - September 2012
